profile:
Few people realize the importance of a working garage door until it breaks down - garage doors are protection for you and your belongings. They house your car, your storage, and serve as an additional entrance to your home. For many they may feel like an afterthought, but they provide a great deal of security in a way that few other doors do.
Best Choice Garage Doors

At Best Choice Garage Doors, our goal is to help you with all of your garage door needs. We are available in Toronto and GTA and specialize in any and all garage door related services including:

    Installation – When you need a new and state of the art garage door installed, we can provide you with the perfect choice for the design of your home – one that will withstand the elements and provide you with the look and security you need.
    Repair – When your garage door breaks down for any reason, our service experts are available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. We will send our professionals directly to your home to get your garage door fixed so you can feel safe and secure again.

We also offer both residential and commercial services, and are available for all of your garage door projects both large and small. Our customer service is second to none, and we will be happy to supply you with the installation, repair, or replacement that you need. Call us today to learn more about what we have to offer.

profile:
All Overhead Doors

We have been in business since 2006, with professional staff having over 20 years of experience in the Overhead Door Industry.  We service the entire GTA and beyond including Georgetown, King City, Nobleton, Milton, Oshawa, Barrie, etc.  

We are a small company that prides itself in its service.  We specialize in Custom Residential Garage Doors in Wood or Steel Maintenance Free Insulated Doors and carry only Liftmaster/Chamberlain electric operators and all accessories.   

We have an excellent and friendly service staff to look after all your repair needs, including springs, cables, tracks, balancing lubrication, and anything related to having your garage door function properly. 

We are an official provider of many Manufacturers so there no product or style we can not provide.

We offer a 24/HR Service and FREE On Site Estimates so please contact at any time.

PLEASE VISIT OUR INSTAGRAM PAGE TO VIEW SOME OF OUR MOST RECENT PROJECTS @alloverheaddoors

profile:
Pro Entry Is the leading Garage door repair & installation service in Toronto & Across the GTA.  
Our professional services revolve around quality and competitive pricing.

From garage door sales to installations, services, and repairs, we guarantee your satisfaction because we aim to provide the best services while building great relationships with our customers. 
 
Whether you need assistance with a residential, commercial, or industrial garage door, our team of trained and licensed professionals goes above and beyond to meet your unique needs.
 
We are an authorized dealer of the best garage door manufacturers in Canada such as Steel-Craft, Garex, and LiftMaster.
enabling us to offer the largest variety of garage doors in the Greater Toronto Area.

profile:
Welcome to City Wide Garage Doors Inc. We have been a family owned and operated company for the last 35 years.

Our Services:

* We do Preventative Maintenance 
* Tune ups for the garage doors which is good to do at least 2 times a year
* We supply and install all hardware for garage doors
* We provide garage door remotes, keypads, and repairs for garage doors and parts
* We will fix broken springs and cables

Our fully equipped service vehicles will always have the necessary parts. 

Our business hours are: 8:00 am – 5:00 pm with emergency services available (24 hours) 

Covid 19 - We are following all the health and safety regulations as instructed by the Province of Ontario to ensure PPE and social distancing will keep our customers and employees safe.
